overview: 'Three and a Half' tells the story of three female convicts recently released from prison. Outside the confines of the prison walls, the trio plan to escape Iran by crossing the border. Though the women revel in each other's humor, their mission is a serious one. If caught trying to escape Iran, they will find themselves in deep trouble. An exciting tale about three women who are both resilient and troubled in equal measure.
title: Three and a Half
